title: ContentAvailability
description: An object describing the availability of content of tiles in a subtree.

availability.description: The availability of the content of the tiles of the subtree. If not all available or unavailable, the size of the buffer will be (N ^ (subtreeDepth + 1) - 1) / (N - 1) bits where N is 4 for tiling scheme `QUADTREE` and 8 for `OCTREE`.
